content: I will provide an update next Tuesday (If I can be fit into the agenda)... but I wanted to let everyone know that things are going to begin to move faster and more publicly with GenomeX. We now have access to a number of labs, and we feel certain that some of them will become members of the Accelerator. Epic has committed to becoming a member, as has Pfizer (who has some interesting use cases). Within the next couple of weeks we will begin to send out press releases, etc. announcing GenomeX, the beginning of going very wide publicly. I had previously referred to our current stage as a "soft opening" - now we are moving to a full, "hard" opening.

@Arthur Hermann - How much time would you need next week?
CC: @ Bob Milius who looks to be scheduled to preside next Tuesday.
10 minutes or so would be fine for the agenda
